casebody.data:
IN RE: Howard L. MARCELLO NO. 2018-OB-0475 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 6, 2018

ORDER

Considering the Petition for Transfer to Disability Inactive Status filed by the Office of Disciplinary Counsel,

IT IS ORDERED that Howard L. Marcello, Louisiana Bar Roll number 21741, be and he hereby is transferred to disability inactive status pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 22(B). Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order shall be effective immediately.

Weimer, J., dissents and assigns reasons Hughes, J., would deny

ATTORNEY DISCIPLINARY PROCEEDING

WEIMER, J., dissenting.

I would order a hearing before deciding whether to place respondent on disability inactive status.
